alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 3:48PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.3 feet, Lowland flooding below Mackay Dam through the Darlington Flats. US Highway 93 may be impacted at the curve by Leslie between 3900 North and 4050 North. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM MDT Monday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM MDT Monday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 3.5 feet Thursday, June 29. - Flood stage is 4.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 06/28/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Mackay Reservoi 4.3 4.4 Mon 2 pm MDT 4.4 4.1 4.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
